name: roboticsshop
description: Modern E-commerce Platform for Robotics Components

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:ml"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && composer install && cd ../ml-service && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && cp .env.example .env && php artisan key:generate && php artisan migrate --seed
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend

author: RoboticsShop Team
